title: Rajasthan Sikh leader Tejinder Pal Timma booked over ‘anti-national’ Facebook post when Amritpal Singh took oath as MP
selftext: SAD president Sukhbir Badal said he was shocked by the FIR against Tejinder Pal Singh Timma, while Jathedar Giani Harpreet Singh said the new criminal laws were being used to target minorities.
